list: 75 Ready-to-Use Boxing Classes – From Zero to Advanced
Adaptation for classes without equipment and in small spaces.
Step-by-step guide on how to apply each move.
Specific plans for beginners, intermediates, and advanced students.
Strategies to manage up to 15 students without losing control.

target.title: WHO ARE THE 75 READY CLASSES FOR?
target.subtitle: No matter your level or goal, our material was designed to suit everyone.

cards.title: Complete Beginners
cards.description: People who have never practiced boxing and want to start from scratch at home, safely.

cards.title: Evolving Students
cards.description: Beginners who need a simple step-by-step guide to progress.

cards.title: Optimized Teachers
cards.description: Teachers and personal trainers who don't want to waste hours planning classes.

cards.title: Creative Instructors
cards.description: Tired of always repeating the same workouts and looking for variety.

cards.title: Busy Practitioners
cards.description: Want adapted workouts ready to apply anywhere.

cards.title: Any Level
cards.description: Practitioners of any level who want adapted workouts ready to apply.

target.disclaimer: Following the course, you do NOT need: experience, expensive equipment, or to spend hours working

list.name: Rodrigo Silva
list.text: I used to spend hours racking my brain to create a new class. Now I just open the material and apply it. My students are more excited, and I can give twice as many classes in the same time.

list.name: Carlos Rosa
list.text: I was out of ideas to vary functional boxing workouts. The 75 classes solved that instantly! I saved time and even increased my classes. Worth every penny.

list.name: Márcio Lira
list.text: Very practical material and straight to the point. It helped me a lot to organize the week's classes.
